txt.en: You should talk to Angbor, who can be found at Aragorn's pavilion on the after-battle Pelennor.
You should bring the armour to the soldiers in and around Aragorn's Pavilion, on the after-battle Pelennor.
'Now here is some handsome, sturdy-looking armour!'
'This armour looks to be my size!'
'The gleam of new-forged armour should breathe courage and pride into any soldier's heart. May fear take hold of no man.'
Angbor has been tasked with arming the men who will march east and wishes to deliver new armour to the soldiers.

'I tell you, my friend, the Haradrim are a devious foe. Do you know they were planning an assault from the south? By good fortune, my men and I intercepted them on our own northward march. I will not bother you with the details, but needless to say, my men and I stood our ground.\n\n'Ah, so, it seems the smiths have some new armour for our men! Would you be a kind [placeholder] and deliver it?'
